mapper.select: SELECT Q_SEQ, ID, Q_TITLE, Q_REGDATE, Q_READCOUNT, Q_REFER, Q_STEP, Q_DEPTH, Q_DELFLAG FROM QNA ORDER BY Q_REFER DESC, Q_STEP
SELECT Q_SEQ, ID, Q_TITLE, Q_CONTENT, Q_REGDATE, Q_REFER, Q_STEP, Q_DEPTH, Q_READCOUNT, Q_DELFLAG FROM QNA WHERE Q_SEQ=#{q_seq} AND Q_VIEWABLE='Y'
SELECT Q_SEQ, ID, Q_TITLE, Q_CONTENT, Q_REGDATE, Q_REFER, Q_STEP, Q_DEPTH, Q_READCOUNT, Q_DELFLAG FROM QNA WHERE Q_SEQ=#{q_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA (Q_SEQ, ID, Q_TITLE, Q_CONTENT, Q_REGDATE, Q_REFER, Q_STEP, Q_DEPTH, Q_READCOUNT, Q_DELFLAG, Q_VIEWABLE) VALUES ( QNA_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id},#{q_title}, #{q_content}, SYSDATE, (SELECT NVL(MAX(Q_REFER)+1, 0) FROM QNA),0,0,0,'N','Y')

INSERT INTO QNA ( Q_SEQ, ID, Q_TITLE, Q_CONTENT, Q_REGDATE, Q_REFER, Q_STEP, Q_DEPTH, Q_READCOUNT, Q_DELFLAG, Q_VIEWABLE) VALUES ( QNA_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{q_title}, #{q_content}, SYSDATE, (SELECT REFER FROM ANSWERBOARD WHERE SEQ=#{q_seq}), (SELECT STEP FROM ANSWERBOARD WHERE SEQ=#{q_seq})+1, (SELECT DEPTH FROM ANSWERBOARD WHERE SEQ=#{q_seq})+1, 0, 'N' , #{q_viewable})
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET Q_TITLE=#{q_title}, Q_CONTENT=#{q_content}, Q_REGDATE=SYSDATE WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
UPDATE QNA SET STEP=STEP+1 WHERE REFER=(SELECT REFER FROM QNA WHERE SEQ=#{q_seq} ) STEP > (SELECT STEP FROM QNA WHERE SEQ=#{q_seq} )
UPDATE QNA SET Q_READCOUNT=Q_READCOUNT+1 WHERE Q_SEQ=#{q_seq}
UPDATE QNA SET Q_DELFLAG='Y' WHERE Q_SEQ=#{q_seq}

UPDATE QNA SET Q_DELFLAG='Y' WHERE SEQ IN
#{q_seq}
